Version History
===============

v0.2.0 (2020-10-26)
-------------------

New Features
^^^^^^^^^^^^

* Lightweight wrapper for birdy WPS client.
* Operators to build workflow.
* Configuration to overwrite default settings.
* Result object to access MetaLink outputs.
* Notebooks with usage examples.

v0.1.0 (2020-03-19)
-------------------

* First release.
